forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 65F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Thunder possible. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
